wp:term.wp:term_description: Attachments are essential tools that enhance the functionality and versatility of the base machine. With a wide range of options available, including buckets, hydraulic breakers, forks, and more, these attachments allow heavy equipment to perform various tasks efficiently and effectively

Auto Fire Suppression system is an essential safety feature designed to detect and extinguish fires quickly. With features such as automatic detection, various suppressant agents, and a robust distribution network, the system ensures effective fire management. Its benefits include enhanced safety, reduced downtime, and compliance with safety regulations, contributing to the overall protection of both the equipment and personnel.

Auto Lubrication System is essential for maintaining the machinery’s performance and longevity. By automatically dispensing and distributing lubricants, the system ensures that all moving parts are adequately lubricated, reducing wear and tear and preventing breakdowns. With features like centralized lubrication, programmable controls, and safety mechanisms, the auto lubrication system enhances operational efficiency, safety, and equipment lifespan.

Battery in a heavy equipment unit is essential for starting the engine and powering electrical systems. Its robust construction, high capacity, and durability ensure reliable performance even in challenging conditions. With features like high cold cranking amps, maintenance-free options, and advanced safety mechanisms, the battery plays a crucial role in the effective and dependable operation of heavy machinery

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.

Coolant is essential for managing engine temperatures and ensuring the equipment operates efficiently. With features such as heat transfer, antifreeze properties, corrosion inhibition, and boil-over protection, coolant plays a critical role in preventing overheating and maintaining optimal performance. Regular maintenance and proper management of coolant help extend the lifespan of the engine and cooling system, reduce downtime, and enhance overall safety and reliability.

Electrical lamp in a heavy equipment unit is to illuminate the work area, improve visibility, and ensure that the equipment can be safely operated and maintained during nighttime or in low-light conditions.

Filters for heavy equipment units are vital for maintaining the performance and longevity of machinery by removing contaminants from oil, air, fuel, hydraulic fluid, and coolant. Types of filters include engine oil filters, air filters, fuel filters, hydraulic filters, transmission filters, cabin air filters, and coolant filters. Each type is designed with specific features to provide effective filtration and protection. Regular maintenance, timely replacement, and proper care of filters are essential to ensure the reliable operation of heavy equipment and prevent costly repairs

A forklift is a heavy equipment used to lift and move heavy goods, especially in warehouses or storage areas. This tool is equipped with two "forks" on the front that can be raised and lowered to lift pallets or other items. Forklifts usually use electric, diesel, gasoline and gas power. Using a forklift can increase efficiency in the process of transporting and storing goods.

A fuel additive in a heavy equipment unit is a crucial component for optimizing fuel performance and engine efficiency. By enhancing combustion, protecting fuel system components, and improving fuel stability, additives contribute to smoother operation, reduced maintenance needs, and extended equipment life. Their role in cleaning, protecting, and optimizing fuel ensures that heavy equipment performs reliably and efficiently under various conditions

Ground Engaging Tools is to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of heavy equipment in various ground or material interaction tasks. They provide the necessary cutting, digging, and gripping capabilities to handle tough materials and achieve precise results

Hose is a vital component responsible for transporting fluids such as hydraulic fluids, coolant, fuel, and lubricants. With features like durable construction, pressure and temperature resistance, flexibility, and chemical compatibility, the hose plays a crucial role in ensuring the efficient operation and longevity of the equipment. Regular maintenance and inspection are essential to prevent issues and maintain safe and reliable performance

Komatsu memperkenalkan forklift pertamanya dan sejak saat itu perusahaan ini menjadi pemain utama dalam industri forklift global. Tak hanya itu saja, Komatsu juga terkenal dengan produk-produknya yang berkualitas tinggi dan tahan lama.

Uncompromising Quality, Unmatched Service. At Bina Pertiwi, we are proud to offer two exceptional lubricant brands—HEO and Castrol. Our commitment is to provide the best in lubrication technology, ensuring your machinery performs at its peak. With our premium products and dedicated service, we bring you the reliability and excellence you need to keep your operations running smoothly

Tractor is a highly versatile and powerful piece of heavy equipment that plays a crucial role in a wide range of industries. Its ability to perform multiple tasks with various attachments makes it an indispensable tool for agriculture, construction, and beyond.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.

Tire is to support the weight of the machinery and provide a stable contact point with the ground. Tires are designed to handle heavy loads, absorb shocks, and provide traction to ensure the equipment can operate effectively on different surfaces and under challenging conditions

Undercarriage is to provide the necessary support and mobility for heavy equipment units, allowing them to move efficiently over rough, uneven, and challenging terrains. It is designed to enhance the stability, traction, and overall performance of the equipment while ensuring durability and reliability

pertama\\n $image_url = wp_get_attachment_url($image_id); \/\/ Dapatkan URL gambar\\n $meta_data['image_url'] = $image_url; \/\/ Tambahkan URL gambar ke data meta\\n }\\n\\n $term_meta_data[$brand->name] = $meta_data; \/\/ Simpan data meta per brand\\n }\\n ?>\\n\\n

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin.wordpressBP
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin.wordpressBP
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://products.binapertiwi.co.id.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Description<\/strong><\/h4>

Filters for heavy equipment units are vital for maintaining the performance and longevity of machinery by removing contaminants from oil, air, fuel, hydraulic fluid, and coolant. Types of filters include engine oil filters, air filters, fuel filters, hydraulic filters, transmission filters, cabin air filters, and coolant filters. Each type is designed with specific features to provide effective filtration and protection. Regular maintenance, timely replacement, and proper care of filters are essential to ensure the reliable operation of heavy equipment and prevent costly Description<\/strong><\/h4>

Description<\/strong><\/h4>

Filters for heavy equipment units are vital for maintaining the performance and longevity of machinery by removing contaminants from oil, air, fuel, hydraulic fluid, and coolant. Types of filters include engine oil filters, air filters, fuel filters, hydraulic filters, transmission filters, cabin air filters, and coolant filters. Each type is designed with specific features to provide effective filtration and protection. Regular maintenance, timely replacement, and proper care of filters are essential to ensure the reliable operation of heavy equipment and prevent costly Description<\/strong><\/h4>

Filters for heavy equipment units are vital for maintaining the performance and longevity of machinery by removing contaminants from oil, air, fuel, hydraulic fluid, and coolant. Types of filters include engine oil filters, air filters, fuel filters, hydraulic filters, transmission filters, cabin air filters, and coolant filters. Each type is designed with specific features to provide effective filtration and protection. Regular maintenance, timely replacement, and proper care of filters are essential to ensure the reliable operation of heavy equipment and prevent costly item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin.wordpressBP
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Serah Terima Forklift Komatsu FD35AT-17
item.dc:creator: admin.wordpressBP
item.content:encoded:
Sehubungan dengan proses transaksi jual beli Unit Forklift Komatsu FD35AT-17 dengan kapasitas 3.5 Ton, Bina Pertiwi cabang Samarinda melakukan kegiatan serah terima unit kepada PT. Trubaindo Coal Mining yang berada di Workshop Adong, Kabupaten Kutai Barat, Kecamatan Melak, Kalimantan Timur. PT. Trubaindo Coal Mining merupakan perusahaan yang bergerak dibidang pertambangan batubara, yang di mana nantinya unit tersebut akan diaplikasikan sebagai support operasional gudang penyimpanan material blasting tambang. 

Dilaksanakan pada tanggal 14 Februari 2023, proses serah terima dihadiri oleh Bapak M. Zainal Arifin (Business Consultant) dan Bapak Narashatika (Marketing Sales Department Head) sebagai perwakilan dari Bina Pertiwi dan Bapak Dedy Ramis (Section Head Maintenance) dari PT. Trubaindo Coal Mining.

Adanya kegiatan serah terima atas proses transaksi jual beli ini diharapkan dapat menjadi jembatan yang menghubungkan Bina Pertiwi untuk saling bersinergi dengan pelanggan. Unit Komatsu yang handal diharapkan dapat mengefektifkan proses operasional, yang juga akan diiringi oleh kesiapan After Sales Support dari Bina Pertiwi untuk memaksimalkan kepuasan pelanggan.
item.excerpt:encoded: Sehubungan dengan proses transaksi jual beli Unit Forklift Komatsu FD35AT-17 dengan kapasitas 3.5 Ton

item.title: Serah Terima 3 Unit FD30T-17 Komatsu Forklift
item.dc:creator: admin.wordpressBP
item.content:encoded:
Pada tanggal 29 Juli 2022, Bina Pertiwi melakukan serah terima 3 Unit FD 30T-17 Komatsu Forklift kepada PT Prasadha Pamunah Limbah Industri (PPLi) yang berada di Nambo, Kec. Klapanunggal, Kabupaten Bogor, Jawa Barat. Kegiatan serah terima ini diwakili oleh Bapak Elpido (General Manager of Technical & Operation) bersama Bapak Asep Bakhtiar Junaedi (Maintenance Manager) selaku dari pihak PPLi, serta Bapak Bayu Kurniansyah (General Manager Sales & Branch Operation) dan Bapak Choirul Chuluq (Area Manager) dari Bina Pertiwi.

Penyerahan unit dilakukan secara berkala, yaitu sebanyak 2 unit diserahkan pada bulan Juni dan 1 unit pada bulan Juli, sehingga total unit yang diserahkan sebanyak 3 unit. Kegiatan tersebut di awali dengan Training dari instruktur tersertifikasi dari Bina Pertiwi bagi para operator dan team maintenance yang berada di PPLi yang diikuti oleh 50 peserta dan dilakukan selama 5 hari pada tanggal 25 hingga 29 Juli 2022.

Proses serah terima dibuka dengan sambutan oleh masing-masing perwakilan dari PPLi dan Bina Pertiwi dengan penyerahan miniatur sebagai simbolik. Sedangkan serah terima Unit FD 30T-17 Komatsu Forklift dilakukan di depan Training Center PPLi. Unit Komatsu Forklift diaplikasikan untuk handling material limbah B3. Penggunaan Komatsu Forklift yang tangguh sangat cocok dengan tipe workload tersebut sehingga diharapkan aktivitas operasional menjadi lebih efektif dengan kerja alat yang maksimal.
item.excerpt:encoded: Pada tanggal 29 Juli 2022, Bina Pertiwi melakukan serah terima 3 Unit FD 30T-17 Komatsu Forklift kepada PT Prasadha Pamunah Limbah Industri (PPLi) yang berada di Nambo, Kec. Klapanunggal, Kabupaten Bogor, Jawa Barat.

item.title: Bina Pertiwi Raih Kemenangan pada Contest Kubota Machinery Indonesia 2023
item.dc:creator: admin.wordpressBP
item.content:encoded:
Marunda Center, 26-27 Juli 2023 - Mekanik berprestasi Susilo Puji Utomo dari cabang Sidrap, telah memberikan penampilan terbaik dan mengharumkan nama Bina Pertiwi pada Dealer Technical Service Contest 2023 yang diadakan oleh Kubota Machinery Indonesia. Pada Kompetisi ini Susilo berhasil meraih juara utama, keberhasilan ini pula yang membawa rekor baru untuk  Bina Pertiwi  dengan menjuarai Dealer Technical Service Contest dan menciptakan rekor Hattrick Juara pada divisi Product Support & Engineering selama tiga kali berturut-turut.

Dealer Technical  Service  Contest merupakan kompetisi untuk layanan dari masing-masing perwakilan dealer Kubota se-Indonesia, yang bertujuan untuk mengembangkan skill service sehingga memperkuat pondasi pelayanan untuk meraih kepuasan pelanggan terhadap Kubota, hal ini yang nantinya mampu menjadikan Kubota sebagai  Global Major Brand. Di edisi sebelumnya Bina Pertiwi memenangkan kompetisi ini sebanyak 2 kali berturut-turut di periode 2018 dan 2019 dengan unit Traktor sebagai topik ujinya. Setelah terhenti tiga tahun karena Covid-19, kini pada tahun 2023 unit uji untuk kompetisi berubah menjadi unit Combine DC-93 yang merupakan new model unit Kubota. Hal ini menjadi tantangan baru yang berbeda sehingga perlu melakukan proses pembelajaran secara menyeluruh mulai dari Engine System, Electrical System, Hydraulic System dan Mechanical System.

Sebagai Mekanik yang sudah berkontribusi selama 8 tahun di Bina Pertiwi, Susilo menyatakan bahwa pantang menyerah dan rasa ingin terus belajar menjadi acuan utamanya untuk sampai pada titik ini.

“Saya selalu mencoba belajar banyak hal baru khususnya dalam dunia mekanik yang terus berkembang sesuai dengan kemajuan teknologi yang ada. Hal itu tentunya menambah pengetahuan dan pengalaman Saya, sehingga saya selalu berusaha untuk pantang menyerah yang beriringan dengan semangat saya untuk meraih yang terbaik. “ ujar Susilo.

Pencapaian yang diraih pada ajang ini menjadi salah satu indikator akan performance  Bina Pertiwi, yang dilengkapi oleh sumber daya manusia yang kompeten dan dapat diandalkan. Hal ini juga merupakan bentuk komitmen dari perusahaan dalam menjamin produk support  yang unggul dan berkualitas. Dengan keberhasilan Susilo Ini, harapannya  seluruh aspek Bina Pertiwi dapat bersinergi dalam memberikan pelayanan terbaik yang dapat dirasakan manfaatnya oleh semua customer.
